        public Chess()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method to launch the game, including validInput check, resign check, draw check. It will call check and checkMate method every time the player makes a move.
        Parameters:
        args - Store the incoming command line arguments for the program.

      • Promotion

        public static Piece Promotion​(Piece temp,
                              java.lang.String[] Move,
                              boolean IsWhite)
        This method will read the player's input and promote the pawn in the willing of the player. If nothing is entered for third input when the pawn reach the end row, that pawn will automatically become a queen.
        Parameters:
        temp - The chosen pawn.
        Move - The input from player.
        IsWhite - A boolean to detect whether the piece is white.
        Returns:
        Return the piece after promotion. For example, if the third is empty, the chosen pawn would become queen.

      • ValidPromotion

        public static boolean ValidPromotion​(Piece temp,
                                     int newY,
                                     java.lang.String string)
        A method to detect whether a player enters a valid value for promotion. If not, the method will return false. If yes, return true.
        Parameters:
        temp - The chosen pawn.
        newY - The Y-coordinate of destination
        string - The third input entered by player for promotion.
        Returns:
        If valid, return true. If not, return false.

      • ValidInput

        public static boolean ValidInput​(java.lang.String[] Move,
                                 Piece[][] chessboard,
                                 boolean WhiteMove)
        A method to check whether the player's input is valid. This method includes common predicates to detect the validness of input. After these common predicates, it will call the piece's own validMove function.
        Parameters:
        Move - Player's input
        chessboard - The current chess board
        WhiteMove - A boolean value to show whether it is white's turn
        Returns:
        If valid, return true. If not, return false.

      • Check

        public static boolean Check​(int newY,
                            int newX,
                            int KingX,
                            int KingY,
                            boolean WhiteMove,
                            Piece[][] chessboard)
        A method for detecting check
        Parameters:
        newY - The chosen piece's Y-coordinate
        newX - The chosen piece's X-coordinate
        KingX - The opponent's King's X-coordinate
        KingY - The opponent's King's Y-coordinate
        WhiteMove - A boolean value to show whether it is white's turn
        chessboard - Current chess board
        Returns:
        If check, return true. If not, return false.

      • CheckMate

        public static boolean CheckMate​(boolean WhiteMove,
                                Piece[][] chessboard)
        A method for detecting checkmate
        Parameters:
        WhiteMove - A boolean value to show whether it is white's turn
        chessboard - Current chess board
        Returns:
        if checkmate, return true. If no, return false.

      • FindKingLoc

        public static int[] FindKingLoc​(boolean WhiteMove,
                                Piece[][] chessboard)
        A method to find opponent's King location
        Parameters:
        WhiteMove - A boolean value to show whether it is white's turn
        chessboard - Current chess board
        Returns:
        Return a integer array that store opponent's King location.

      • ParseCoordinate

        public static void ParseCoordinate​(java.lang.String[] Move)
        A method to parse player's input to numeric coordinates
        Parameters:
        Move - Player's Input
